org.jdrupes.mdoclet

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdrupes.mdoclet.Options

  • public class Options
extends Object

    Processes and stores the command line options.

      • validOptions

        public static boolean validOptions(String[][] options,
                                   com.sun.javadoc.DocErrorReporter errorReporter)

        As specified by the Doclet specification.

        Parameters:
        options - The command line options.
        errorReporter - An error reporter to print messages.
        Returns:
        true if the options are valid.
        See Also:
        Doclet.validOptions(String[][], com.sun.javadoc.DocErrorReporter)

      • load

        public String[][] load(String[][] options,
                       com.sun.javadoc.DocErrorReporter errorReporter)

        Loads the options from the command line.

        Parameters:
        options - The command line options.
        errorReporter - The error reporter for printing messages.
        Returns:
        The options to be forwarded to the standard doclet.
